Source.Name: syndication
Source.Description: syndication is a parser library for RSS and Atom feeds. syndication offers a unified, format-agnostic view on the parsed feed, so that the using application does not need to distinguish between feed formats.

Package.Name: syndication
Package.Description: syndication is a parser library for RSS and Atom feeds. syndication offers a unified, format-agnostic view on the parsed feed, so that the using application does not need to distinguish between feed formats.
